LanguageData.TechPoolModeDesc: 定义生成的玩家派系殖民者的技术池。
LanguageData.TechPoolIncludesScenarioTitle: 包括剧本设定的开局科技
LanguageData.TechPoolIncludesScenarioDesc: 如果选中，还将包括您在剧本编辑器中添加的开局科技。
LanguageData.WeaponPoolModeTitle: Combat specialists start with weapons from...
LanguageData.WeaponPoolModeDesc: Defines the pool from which to draw weapons proficiency for the player's colonists who are expert shooters or brawlers when they are created.
LanguageData.ResearchSpeedTiedToDifficultyDesc: If checked, the base speed for research is tied to the difficulty settings, with no changes on Easy and up to 70% decrease on Hard. If unchecked, it defaults to 90% slower than vanilla.
LanguageData.StudySpeedTiedToDifficultyTitle: Difficulty settings slows down tech studying.
LanguageData.StudySpeedTiedToDifficultyDesc: If checked, the base speed for studying new techs is tied to the difficulty settings, dropping to 90% on Medium up to 80% on hard.
LanguageData.BookStoreRetrieveBookDesc: 在暑假中查找并取出指定的书籍
LanguageData.MessageFiledTech: {0}的知识已添加到我们的库中。
LanguageData.MessageEjectedTech: {0}的知识已从我们的库中删除。
LanguageData.LacksFundamentalKnowledge: {0_nameDef}缺少有关这些课题的基本知识。
LanguageData.MissingRequirementToLearnWeapon: {0_nameDef} has no corresponding knowledge or books to learn about {1}.
LanguageData.NoWeaponToLearn: {0_nameDef}已经知道如何使用这些武器。
LanguageData.UnknownWeapon: {0_nameDef}尚未接受使用此武器的训练。
LanguageData.EvilWeapon: {0_nameDef}认为这种奇怪的武器是邪恶的，{0_pronoun}不会碰它。
LanguageData.LetterResearchRequest_SuccessHR: 这项研究是成功的。通过合作，您对{2}的理解有所提高。\n\n与{0}的关系已改善了{1}。
LanguageData.LetterResearchRequest_TriumphHR: 研究取得了巨大的成功！通过一同通力合作，您取得了突破，并发现了{2}的秘密。\n\n与{0}的关系已改善了{1}。
LanguageData.ResearchRequestXPGainHR: {0}，您的研究人员，在{1}获得了宝贵的专业知识，并获得了{2}的智识。
